column1: tossed outside off, onto the backfoot for a cut but gets a bottome edge and runs past short thirdman for a boundary
quicker on leg, nudges it to onside for a quick run
comes down for a slog shot but get a top edge towards short thirdman and he takes a good catch running backwards, Gohar strikes for islamabad
flighted up, blocks it to short thirdman but no run there
flighted up again, drives it to onside but to the fielder, good over from gohar, puts a bit of pressure back on quetta
tossed up, pushed to onside but to a filder again
quick outside off, pushed of the backfoot to covers for a quick run
tossed up, makes room but can only block it
flighted up, umar makes room again for a inside out drive and gets it handsomely away for a boundary to covers
comes down the track this time and clubs it over midwicket for a huge six
makes room and pushed to off-side for a quick run
on the pads, flicks it away to square leg for a run
outside off, cuts it of the backfoot but to the point fielder
quicker ball, gets him onto the backfoot and played back to the bowler
down the track but doesn't connect well as it falls in vacant area and gets him a couple
flighted outside off, moves back and cuts it for a quick run
onto the backfoot and driven to covers for a run
length ball, onto the backfoot and pushed down to long-on for a run
length ball, moves away making room and pushes it between cover and mid-off for a run
good length outside off, goes a cut but doesn't connect well and it bounces to the keeper
comes down the pitch for a wild slog and gers beaten as it goes through him just pas the leg-stump
short of a length, goes deep inside the crease and slaps it down to long-on just for a run
down the leg and picks it nicely of his pads over fine leg for a six
slower ball and beats him, moved across to for a inside-out drive but was through the shot before the ball even came
quicker outside off and wide given
tossed outside off but spins away further and another wide
onto the backfoot and pulls the length ball to mid-wicket for a run
onto the backfoot and pushed away to square leg for a quick run
outside off again and wide given
tossed up, looks for a slog towards mid-wicket but gets beaten, just away from the off-stump
tossed up, goes for a slog again and connects this time and it goes just over the mid-wicket fielder for a six
drags the length back, goes deep inside the crease and pulls it firmly this time for a huge six
onto the backfoot and pushed away to mid-wicket for a run
slower ball does the trick, moves across for a slog but missed it and it knocks into the middle-stump
bouncer but down the legside and wide given
short ball again and wide given as it goes way over the batsman's head
slow ball yorker but just gets it down the leg-side and another wide of the over
slower ball outside off, waits for it and drives it just over the diving mid-off fielder for a boundary, might have just got a finger tip to it
slower ball, cuts it late just away of the keeper and gets run
full on leg, slogs it across to mid-wicket and takes a good catch running to his left, he just over run it but managed it well in the end
short ball and gets the tennis ball bounce over the head of the batsman for a wide
walks down to length ball outside off, swings wild at it and gets a top edge down the throat of thirdman
full on off, driven to mid-off but no run there
back of a length outside off, tries to cut but beaten by pace
good length bal, looks to nudge it to on-side but get s leading edge and just short of diving point fielder
slower ball outside off, pushed to point but not fielded cleanly and give away a run
moves across and gives it a heave but only high over his head, keeper under it for a simple catch
wide outside off and almost bounced out of the pitch
slower ball, drags it away to long-on, looking for the second and gets it easily in the end as the bowler couldn't collect the return cleanly
fuller outside off, drives it away to the right of long-off for a easy double this time
slower ball but dispatched straight for a six
fuller outside off this time, trying to get back at the batsmam but cuts it over point for a boundary
good length outside off, pushed of the backfoot to point
down the leg side and wide given
good length outside off, punches it of the backfoot and finds the fielder at cover point
back of length outsdie off, just enough room to punch it past point for a boundary, ronchi and islamabad away with chase
on the pads and flicks it down to fine leg for  another boundary
back of length but much straighter, pushes it back to the bowler
outside off, driven but only as far as the cover fielder
tossed up, driven straight back as nawaz gets a hand to it
flighted outside off, delport can only rock back and block it
walks down casually and plays it as it spins down to long-on for a run
flat and straight, ronchi defends it back to the bowler
tossed on leg, nudges it away to square leg for a run
back of a length, delport with a push of the backfoot but to the short mid-wicket fielder
good length on leg-stump, looks to flick it but gets it of his pads away to point, a half-hearted appeal
good length ball, comes down and punches it away to sweeper cover for a run
good length outside off, just beats the outside edge as he looked to push it to cover
good length again, pushed with soft hands to mid-off for a quick run
slower ball, plays it nicely away towards point for a quick run
punched on the backfoot to a good length ball but straight to point
full on leg, driven firmly to mid-wicket and gets a run
full on off, driven firmly to cover but no run there
full on leg, drives this firmly away from the fielder on the boundary at on-side
slower ball, driven uppishly and just past Bravo down to long-on for a run
fuller on leg, goes a drive but gets it of his pads to the keeper
walks down the track, hasnain tried to follow him but ronchi is too good, hits it over mid-wicket for a huge six
good length outside off, cuts it down to thirdman for a run
back of length outside off, flashes hard at it but doesn't that well and rolls to cover point fielder
back of length again, Delport moves back and pushes it again to the cover point fielder
back of length, looks to hit it hard and straight but doesn't time it well and it goes as far as the mid-off fielder
good length on middle-leg, pushed to mid-on for a quick run
full toss, comes to it and drives it down to long-on on the bounce for a run
well directed yorker on his foot, loud appeal but not-out as it was clearly going down leg, they get across for leg-bye run
good length outside off, Delport has enough room to smack it past cover for a boundary
slower ball, but gets it a bit wrong as Delport times this full toss sweetly away to the left of mid-wicket fielder for a boundary
yorker, that somehow missed the off-stump, great comeback from DJ Bravo here
full on leg, tries to nudge it past short fine leg but gets it of his pads to him and they scrap through for a leg-bye
flighted up, Delport start away goes for a reverse sweep and connects well past point for a boundary
flights it up as he comes down for it, driven straight back to the bowler
flighted up, onto the knees for a slog to mid-wicket but just missed it
drags the legnth short and pushes it away to on-side for a run
flighted up, moves back and pushes at it and gets it only across to point fielder
flighted up, pushes it to point with soft hands as he looks for a qucik run, throw at the non-striker end beats the bowler and the covering fielder for the second run
tossed up, as he walks down the track and lofts it between long-on and mid-wicket for a couple
moves across and punches it down to long-off for a run
Ronchi with a straight six, tossed up as he comes down the track and hits it straight over the bowler's head for a six
flighted up, looks to drive it but just manages to play it back to the bowler
quicker outside off, rocnhi onto the backfoot and punched it to cover fence
drags this short, ronchi moves back and pulls it away to mid-wicket for a run
flighted up, drags it away to mid-wicket for a run
comes down the track to a flighted ball, but gets beaten and easy for Sarfraz to breaks the stumps
flighted up, looks to defend but gets a thick outside edge past the slip fielder for a couple
googly not read by the batsman, moves back to cut but just manages to block it last moment
flighted up, moves back to defend it but gets beaten and it knocks the off-stump
flighted up, Asif moves back and defends it confidently back to the bowler
back of length and played back by ronchi to nawaz
quick on leg, tries to flick it but gets it of his thigh to short fine leg for leg-bye run
what a ball, gets him forward to drive and spins sharply away to hit the top of off-stump, Asif departs without disturbing the score
tossed on leg, easy for patel to push it away to on-side and get off the mark
back of length, Ronchi stands straight and flicks this firmly on the bounce to the fielder and away for a boundary as he couldn't get hold of it
tossed up, onto the backfoot and pushed only to the cover fielder
flighted up, nudges it away to on-side for a run
flighted , stays back and pushes it down to long-off for a run
flighted up again, driven down to long-on for a run
loops it up, ronchi goes down on the knee and slogs it over mid-wicket for a huge six
drags it short, ronchi moves back and pulls it away forward of square leg for a boundary
looped outside off, pushed of the backfoot to covers for a run
tossed up, moves back to cut it but gets it low on the bat and back to the bowler
tossed outside off, drives it on the rise past cover fielder for a boundary
quicker outside off this time, punches it to sweeper cover for a run
pushed it flat and quick as he sees him walking down the track, patel manages well to get his bat to it but to the point fielder
tossed up, comes down the track again and lofts it to sweeper cover with an inside-out drive for a run
tossed outside off, cuts it but doesn't get hold of it and it rolls to the point fielder
back of length, played with soft hands to covers for a quick run
full outside off, perfect for Ronchi to loft it over mid-off for a boundary
slower ball by Hasnain away from ronchi as he moved early to make room, they manage to scrap through for a quick run
good length angling into him, tries to nudge it but gets it of his pads, ronchi runs halfway down the track and is sent back, direct hit would have had him by miles here
good length on middle, Patel looks to lofts it over mid-off and manages just enough to get across for a couple
full outside off, driven firmly and past the diving fielder at the top of the circle for a boundary
slower ball, drags it away to square leg for a run
full on leg, patel drives it frimly but just for a run at mid-wicket
yorker from tanvir and dealt well by ronchi, pushed down to long-on for a run
slow length ball, patels moves across and just drags it away for a run to on-side, good variations used by Tanvir
Slower ball again and beats the bat of Ronchi this time
back of length outside off, pushed gently towards point for a quick run
dragged short by fawad, ronchi pulls it away to mid-wicket for a run
give it some air as patels starts moving down early, jams it straight back to the bowler
looped up, patels looks to slog it towards mid-wicket but gets beaten by the slowness
flighted up, driven down to long-on for a run
flighted on leg, Ronchi looks to sweep it across but get a leading edge, watson gets under it at short fine leg and takes it, Fawad strikes and gets a big fish here
flighted outside off, Rizwan wants to hit his first ball out of the park but misses it comepletely, was a googly
Another set batsman bites the dust, short outside off, patel looks to drag it to mid-wicket but gets a faint edge to the keeper
short ball outside off, faheem guides it towards thirdman where Azam khan out of all others put a dive in to save a boundary
faheem looks to pull this towards mid-wicket but it gets high on him as he gets it only across to Tanvir for a simple catch, Great stuff from the youngster
back of a lenght outside off, shadab looks to nudge it to on-side but gets it low on the bat and across to cover for a quick run
short outside off, pushed to covers for a quick run again
full toss, lofts it down to long-on for a run
good length ball, nudges it away for a quick run
good length, drags it across for a quick run
full outsdie off, smacks it past sweeper cover for a boundary
slow on leg, tries to flick but gets it of his pads to short fine leg for a leg-bye
full toss, tries to flick it across but lofts it high and just safe from the running Bravo
short outsdie off, Rizwan cuts it hard in the air and straight to Rossouw but dropped
good length outsdie off, shadab looks for the big-shot but gets beaten
slower back of length, shadab looks to pull it but gets it high on the bat and straigh to Bravo at mid-wicket, who takes the catch and puts on his dancing shoes
slower ball outside off, cuts it to point and they get across for a run of the over-throw
good length on middle, hits it straight up in the air towards Shehzad at long-on, who takes it and tumbles across
good length outside off, gives it a full swing but doesn't connect
short ball, looks to pull it but beaten
short ball again, beats him one more time trying to pull
good length outside off, Gohar moves across to scoop it over fine leg but gets beaten the third time
short outside off once more with the same swing and a miss
short outside off, connect this time and connects well gets six over covers
short ball again, tries to pull it but beaten again, good reply from the youngster after being hit for a six
slow outside off, comes down and waits for it to drive it down to long-off for a run
short outside off, pushed to covers for a run
Yorker on leg-stump, looks to drive it but gets beaten and it knocks the leg-stump
good length on leg, drags it away for a run
slow outsdie off and beats gohar again
full toss, lofted down to long-on for a couple
